thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 5 of 171
thread.title: Lianne Williams

author: Lianne Williams
title: Lianne Williams
text: We found TrustedHousesitters to a very safe and efficient way to ask for house sitting assistance. Being able to load information directly into the templates made the process very straight forward, and contact and assistance went smoothly, with few questions overall. The nice part was being about to converse electronically with the potential house sitters and then telephone each to get a fuller perspective of the house sitter before deciding on them. Nicely done overall.
